article: _  New Year's Day, many people eat special food for good luck. In Spain and some Latin--American counties , people  eat  twelve grapes at midnight on New Year's Eve--one grape  _  good luck in  _  month of the new year. Chinese people eat  dumplings  .Some have coins inside. Everyone  tries  to find the coin for luck and money in the new year. Of course they don't eat the  _  . Japanese  _  eat noodles on New Year's Eve and their birthdays .  _  may bring them good luck and  _  life.
